options.content:
NTM - Nexus Traffic Monitoring - Interfaces

Interface(s) - ${intf}

value.title: Details of switches and switchports in ${__value.raw}
Details of switch ${__value.raw} and its ports
Details of Interface ${__data.fields["Peer Interface"]} in ${__data.fields["Peer Name"]}

targets.query: SELECT location as Location, last(description) as "Description", oper_state as "Operational State", oper_mode as "Oper Mode", oper_speed as "Speed", switchname as "Switch Name", peer as "Peer", peer_intf as "Peer Interface", peer_type as "Peer Type", peer_name as "Peer Name" FROM "$db"."$rp"."SwitchIntfStats" WHERE ("switchname" =~ /^$switchname$/ and type='nexus' and "intf" =~ /^$intf$/) AND  $timeFilter GROUP BY switch,intf

panels.description: Uses NTM collector to show average utilization of the collection interval

targets.query: select max("RX Traffic") as "RX Traffic" from(SELECT non_negative_difference(rx_bytes)*8/(elapsed(rx_bytes,1ms)/1000) as "RX Traffic" FROM "$db"."$rp"."SwitchIntfStats" WHERE ("switchname" =~ /^$switchname$/ AND "intf" =~ /^$intf$/) AND $timeFilter group by intf,peer,peer_name,peer_intf) where $timeFilter GROUP BY time($__interval), intf,peer,peer_name,peer_intf

select max("TX Traffic") as "TX Traffic" from(SELECT non_negative_difference(tx_bytes)*8/(elapsed(tx_bytes,1ms)/1000) as "TX Traffic" FROM "$db"."$rp"."SwitchIntfStats" WHERE ("switchname" =~ /^$switchname$/ AND "intf" =~ /^$intf$/) AND $timeFilter group by intf,peer,peer_name,peer_intf) where $timeFilter GROUP BY time($__interval), intf,peer,peer_name,peer_intf
SELECT last(oper_speed)*1000000000 as "Max" FROM "$db"."$rp"."SwitchIntfStats" WHERE ("switchname" =~ /^$switchname$/ AND "intf" =~ /^$intf$/) AND $timeFilter GROUP BY time($__interval), intf

panels.title: Traffic on $intf on $switchname (${min_interval}-sec Avg)

panels.description: Uses GNMI OpenConfig export to show average utilization of the sample interval. This data is not collected by the NTM collector and it must be configured separately.

targets.query: select max("TX Traffic") as "TX Traffic" from (SELECT non_negative_difference("out_octets")*8/(elapsed(out_octets)/1000000000) as "TX Traffic" FROM "$db"."$rp"."oc_int_counters" WHERE ("source"::tag = '172.22.36.56') AND ("name"::tag =~ /^$intf$/) AND $timeFilter) where  $timeFilter GROUP BY time($__interval), "name"::tag

select max("RX Traffic") as "RX Traffic" from (SELECT non_negative_difference("in_octets")*8/(elapsed(in_octets)/1000000000) as "RX Traffic" FROM "$db"."$rp"."oc_int_counters" WHERE ("source"::tag = '172.22.36.56') AND ("name"::tag =~ /^$intf$/) AND $timeFilter) where  $timeFilter GROUP BY time($__interval), "name"::tag

SELECT last(oper_speed)*1000000000 as "Max" FROM "$db"."$rp"."SwitchIntfStats" WHERE ("switchname" =~ /^$switchname$/ AND "intf" =~ /^$intf$/) AND $timeFilter GROUP BY time($__interval), intf, peer_name,peer_intf

panels.title: Traffic on $intf on $switchname (1-sec Avg)

targets.query: select max("non_negative_difference") as "RX CRC" from(SELECT non_negative_difference(rx_crc) FROM "$db"."$rp"."SwitchIntfStats" WHERE ("switchname" =~ /^$switchname$/ AND "intf" =~ /^$intf$/) AND $timeFilter) where $timeFilter GROUP BY time($__interval), intf,peer_name,peer_intf

select max("non_negative_difference") as "RX CRC Stomped" from(SELECT non_negative_difference(rx_crc_stomped) FROM "$db"."$rp"."SwitchIntfStats" WHERE ("switchname" =~ /^$switchname$/ AND "intf" =~ /^$intf$/) AND $timeFilter) where $timeFilter GROUP BY time($__interval), intf, peer_name, peer_intf

select max("RX Traffic")/(max("speed")*1000000000) as "RX Traffic" from(SELECT non_negative_difference(rx_bytes)*8/(elapsed(oper_speed,1ms)/1000)as "RX Traffic", last(oper_speed) as "speed" FROM "$db"."$rp"."SwitchIntfStats" WHERE ("switchname" =~ /^$switchname$/ AND "intf" =~ /^$intf$/) AND $timeFilter group by intf,peer,peer_name,peer_intf) where $timeFilter GROUP BY time($__interval), intf, peer,peer_name,peer_intf

select max("TX Traffic")/(max("speed")*1000000000) as "TX Traffic" from(SELECT non_negative_difference(tx_bytes)*8/(elapsed(oper_speed,1ms)/1000) as "TX Traffic", last(oper_speed) as "speed" FROM "$db"."$rp"."SwitchIntfStats" WHERE ("switchname" =~ /^$switchname$/ AND "intf" =~ /^$intf$/) AND $timeFilter group by intf,peer,peer_name,peer_intf) where $timeFilter GROUP BY time($__interval), intf,peer,peer_name,peer_intf

select max("non_negative_difference") as "RX <64 bytes" from(SELECT non_negative_difference(rxPkts64Octets) FROM "$db"."$rp"."SwitchIntfStats" WHERE ("switchname" =~ /^$switchname$/ AND "intf" =~ /^$intf$/) AND $timeFilter) where $timeFilter GROUP BY time($__interval), intf

select max("non_negative_difference") as "RX 65 - 127 bytes" from(SELECT non_negative_difference(rxPkts65to127Octets) FROM "$db"."$rp"."SwitchIntfStats" WHERE ("switchname" =~ /^$switchname$/ AND "intf" =~ /^$intf$/) AND $timeFilter) where $timeFilter GROUP BY time($__interval), intf

select max("non_negative_difference") as "RX 128 - 255 bytes" from(SELECT non_negative_difference(rxPkts128to255Octets) FROM "$db"."$rp"."SwitchIntfStats" WHERE ("switchname" =~ /^$switchname$/ AND "intf" =~ /^$intf$/) AND $timeFilter) where $timeFilter GROUP BY time($__interval), intf

select max("non_negative_difference") as "RX 256 - 511 bytes" from(SELECT non_negative_difference(rxPkts256to511Octets) FROM "$db"."$rp"."SwitchIntfStats" WHERE ("switchname" =~ /^$switchname$/ AND "intf" =~ /^$intf$/) AND $timeFilter) where $timeFilter GROUP BY time($__interval), intf

select max("non_negative_difference") as "RX 512 - 1023 bytes" from(SELECT non_negative_difference(rxPkts512to1023Octets) FROM "$db"."$rp"."SwitchIntfStats" WHERE ("switchname" =~ /^$switchname$/ AND "intf" =~ /^$intf$/) AND $timeFilter) where $timeFilter GROUP BY time($__interval), intf

select max("non_negative_difference") as "RX 1024 - 1518 bytes" from(SELECT non_negative_difference(rxPkts1024to1518Octets) FROM "$db"."$rp"."SwitchIntfStats" WHERE ("switchname" =~ /^$switchname$/ AND "intf" =~ /^$intf$/) AND $timeFilter) where $timeFilter GROUP BY time($__interval), intf

select max("non_negative_difference") as "RX Jumbo" from(SELECT non_negative_difference(rx_jumbo) FROM "$db"."$rp"."SwitchIntfStats" WHERE ("switchname" =~ /^$switchname$/ AND "intf" =~ /^$intf$/) AND $timeFilter) where $timeFilter GROUP BY time($__interval), intf

select max("non_negative_difference") as "TX <64 bytes" from(SELECT non_negative_difference(txPkts64Octets) FROM "$db"."$rp"."SwitchIntfStats" WHERE ("switchname" =~ /^$switchname$/ AND "intf" =~ /^$intf$/) AND $timeFilter) where $timeFilter GROUP BY time($__interval), intf

select max("non_negative_difference") as "TX 65 - 127 bytes" from(SELECT non_negative_difference(txPkts65to127Octets) FROM "$db"."$rp"."SwitchIntfStats" WHERE ("switchname" =~ /^$switchname$/ AND "intf" =~ /^$intf$/) AND $timeFilter) where $timeFilter GROUP BY time($__interval), intf

select max("non_negative_difference") as "TX 128 - 255 bytes" from(SELECT non_negative_difference(txPkts128to255Octets) FROM "$db"."$rp"."SwitchIntfStats" WHERE ("switchname" =~ /^$switchname$/ AND "intf" =~ /^$intf$/) AND $timeFilter) where $timeFilter GROUP BY time($__interval), intf

select max("non_negative_difference") as "TX 256 - 511 bytes" from(SELECT non_negative_difference(txPkts256to511Octets) FROM "$db"."$rp"."SwitchIntfStats" WHERE ("switchname" =~ /^$switchname$/ AND "intf" =~ /^$intf$/) AND $timeFilter) where $timeFilter GROUP BY time($__interval), intf

select max("non_negative_difference") as "TX 512 - 1023 bytes" from(SELECT non_negative_difference(txPkts512to1023Octets) FROM "$db"."$rp"."SwitchIntfStats" WHERE ("switchname" =~ /^$switchname$/ AND "intf" =~ /^$intf$/) AND $timeFilter) where $timeFilter GROUP BY time($__interval), intf

select max("non_negative_difference") as "TX 1024 - 1518 bytes" from(SELECT non_negative_difference(txPkts1024to1518Octets) FROM "$db"."$rp"."SwitchIntfStats" WHERE ("switchname" =~ /^$switchname$/ AND "intf" =~ /^$intf$/) AND $timeFilter) where $timeFilter GROUP BY time($__interval), intf

select max("non_negative_difference") as "TX Jumbo" from(SELECT non_negative_difference(tx_jumbo) FROM "$db"."$rp"."SwitchIntfStats" WHERE ("switchname" =~ /^$switchname$/ AND "intf" =~ /^$intf$/) AND $timeFilter) where $timeFilter GROUP BY time($__interval), intf

panels.description: These are the drops in the ingress queues caused by the PFC Watchdog feature as reported by the NX-OS command show queuing pfc-queue detail. Ingress queues are relevant only when PFC is enabled.

targets.query: select max(non_negative_difference) as "Dropped Packets" from(SELECT non_negative_difference(drop_pkts) FROM "$db"."$rp"."SwitchQStats" WHERE ("switchname" =~ /^$switchname$/ AND "intf" =~ /^$intf$/) AND $timeFilter group by q) where $timeFilter GROUP BY time($__interval), intf, q

panels.title: Per Queue Drops on $intf on $switchname

panels.description: These are WRED/AFD & tail drops reported by the NX-OS command show queuing interface.

targets.query: select max("non_negative_difference") as "Random Drops" from(SELECT non_negative_difference(rand_drop_pkts) FROM "$db"."$rp"."SwitchQStats" WHERE ("switchname" =~ /^$switchname$/ AND "intf" =~ /^$intf$/) AND $timeFilter GROUP BY switch,intf,q,peer,peer_intf) where $timeFilter GROUP BY time($__interval), switch,intf, q, peer, peer_intf

select max("non_negative_difference") as "TX Drops" from(SELECT non_negative_difference(drop_pkts) FROM "$db"."$rp"."SwitchQStats" WHERE ("switchname" =~ /^$switchname$/ AND "intf" =~ /^$intf$/) AND $timeFilter GROUP BY switch,intf,q,peer,peer_intf) where $timeFilter GROUP BY time($__interval), switch,intf, q, peer, peer_intf

panels.title: Drops on $intf on $switchname

properties.value: No. of Tx Pause per second

targets.query: select max("non_negative_difference") as "TX Pause" from(SELECT non_negative_difference(tx_pause) FROM "$db"."$rp"."SwitchQStats" WHERE ("switchname" =~ /^$switchname$/ AND "intf" =~ /^$intf$/) AND $timeFilter GROUP BY switch,intf,q,peer,peer_intf) where $timeFilter GROUP BY time($__interval), switch,intf, q, peer, peer_intf

select max("RX Traffic") as "RX Traffic" from(SELECT non_negative_difference(rx_bytes)*8/(elapsed(oper_speed,1ms)/1000) as "RX Traffic" FROM "$db"."$rp"."SwitchIntfStats" WHERE ("switchname" =~ /^$switchname$/ AND "intf" =~ /^$intf$/) AND $timeFilter) where $timeFilter GROUP BY time($__interval), intf

panels.title: TX Pause Frame Monitoring Compared with RX Traffic on $intf on $switchname

properties.value: No. of Rx Pause per second

targets.query: select max("non_negative_difference") as "RX Pause" from(SELECT non_negative_difference(rx_pause) FROM "$db"."$rp"."SwitchQStats" WHERE ("switchname" =~ /^$switchname$/ AND "intf" =~ /^$intf$/) AND $timeFilter GROUP BY switch,intf,q,peer,peer_intf) where $timeFilter GROUP BY time($__interval), switch,intf, q, peer, peer_intf

select max("TX Traffic") as "TX Traffic" from(SELECT non_negative_difference(tx_bytes)*8/(elapsed(oper_speed,1ms)/1000) as "TX Traffic" FROM "$db"."$rp"."SwitchIntfStats" WHERE ("switchname" =~ /^$switchname$/ AND "intf" =~ /^$intf$/) AND $timeFilter) where $timeFilter GROUP BY time($__interval), intf

panels.title: RX Pause Frame Monitoring Compared with TX Traffic on $intf on $switchname

targets.query: select max("non_negative_difference") as "ECN Marked Pkts" from(SELECT non_negative_difference(ecn_marked_pkts) FROM "$db"."$rp"."SwitchQStats" WHERE ("switchname" =~ /^$switchname$/ AND "intf" =~ /^$intf$/) AND $timeFilter GROUP BY switch,intf,q,peer,peer_intf) where $timeFilter GROUP BY time($__interval), switch,intf, q, peer, peer_intf

panels.description: This is the instant value at the time of collection

targets.query: SELECT max("q_depth") AS "Q Depth" FROM "$db"."$rp"."SwitchQStats" WHERE "switchname" =~ /^$switchname$/ AND "intf" =~ /^$intf$/ and $timeFilter GROUP BY time($__interval), switch,intf,q,peer,peer_intf fill(linear)

panels.title: Queue Utilization on $intf on $switchname

targets.query: SELECT peak as "Peak" FROM "$db"."$rp"."SwitchBurst" WHERE "switchname" =~ /^$switchname$/ AND "intf" =~ /^$intf$/ AND $timeFilter GROUP BY intf, q
SELECT "start-depth" as "Start" FROM "$db"."$rp"."SwitchBurst" WHERE "switchname" =~ /^$switchname$/ AND "intf" =~ /^$intf$/ AND $timeFilter GROUP BY intf, q
SELECT "end-depth" as "End" FROM "$db"."$rp"."SwitchBurst" WHERE "switchname" =~ /^$switchname$/ AND "intf" =~ /^$intf$/ AND $timeFilter GROUP BY intf, q
SELECT "duration" as "Duration" FROM "$db"."$rp"."SwitchBurst" WHERE "switchname" =~ /^$switchname$/ AND "intf" =~ /^$intf$/ AND $timeFilter GROUP BY intf, q

panels.title: Burst (Left y-axis show peak buffer utilization (bar). Right y-axis show duration of burst (point))

targets.query: select max("TX Traffic") as "TX Traffic" from(SELECT non_negative_difference(tx_bytes)*8/(elapsed(tx_bytes,1ms)/1000) as "TX Traffic" FROM "$db"."$rp"."SwitchQStats" WHERE ("switchname" =~ /^$switchname$/ AND "intf" =~ /^$intf$/) AND $timeFilter group by q) where $timeFilter GROUP BY time($__interval), intf, q

panels.title: Per Queue Egress Traffic on $intf on $switch

list.definition: show tag values from  "$db"."$rp"."Switches" with key=switchname WHERE type='nexus' and $timeFilter
list.label: Switch Name
list.name: switchname
list.query: show tag values from  "$db"."$rp"."Switches" with key=switchname WHERE type='nexus' and $timeFilter

list.definition: select last(switch) from (select model,switch from "$db"."$rp"."Switches" where switchname =~ /$switchname/ and type='nexus' and $timeFilter)
list.label: Switch
list.name: switch
list.query: select last(switch) from (select model,switch from "$db"."$rp"."Switches" where switchname =~ /$switchname/ and type='nexus' and $timeFilter)

list.definition: show tag values from "$db"."$rp"."SwitchIntfStats" with key=intf where switchname =~ /$switchname/ and type='nexus' and $timeFilter
list.label: Interfaces
list.name: intf
list.query: show tag values from "$db"."$rp"."SwitchIntfStats" with key=intf where switchname =~ /$switchname/ and type='nexus' and $timeFilter

list.definition: select last(elapsed) from (select elapsed(model,1s) from "$db"."$rp"."Switches" where switchname =~ /$switchname/ and type='nexus' and $timeFilter)
list.name: min_interval
list.query: select last(elapsed) from (select elapsed(model,1s) from "$db"."$rp"."Switches" where switchname =~ /$switchname/ and type='nexus' and $timeFilter)
